Posts.Content: Thankyou my op was 19th April and I have a stoma bag attached to the wound to drain it’s still open , it’s  Really painful constant ache I’m going to Drs today to try and get stronger painkillers, got oncologist tomorrow regarding chemo but as you say they won’t start till wound heals , getting really upset with it all xxxxx

Posts.Content: just upped my codeine intake it’s the Seroma but it’s looking like it’s stoppung as not much fluid from last 2 days in stoma bag , oncologist today @ 2.20pm fingers crossed can get on with treatment but I’m sure they would want the open wound to b healed which how long that will take xx Thankyou for responding sometimes u feel so alone ...
